Edward Green(e)

Born: March 11, 1798/1799 (5)

Birthplace: Jefferson County, New York (5)

Mother: Huldah Sweet (5, 6)

Father: Judge Edward Greene (5, 6)

Wife: Sarah Peckham (1, 5, 6)

Married: 1818 (5)

Marriage Place: Almond, Allegany County, New York (5)

Direct Descendant: Rebecca Green (1, 5)

Death: 20 November, 1870 (, 6, 5)

Death Place: Milton, Rock County, Wisconsin (5, 6)

Burial Place:Rock River Cemetery, Milton, Rock County, Wisconsin - Plot 67 (5, 6)
